title: Consider the Phase Transition
text: When a solid turns into a gas, this process is known as sublimation. What happens to the arrangement of the iodine molecules during this transition?

title: Think about Molecular Disorder
text: In a solid, molecules are in a fixed, ordered arrangement. In a gas, what's different about molecule arrangement in terms of order and movement?

title: Compare Molecular States
text: How does the state of matter change from solid to gas affect the system's disorder or randomness?
